full_summary:
# Tenders for Aircraft Oxygen Equipment

## Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type:** Notice of Proposed Procurement
* **Method of Procurement:** Request for Proposal (RFP) through Competitive - Open bidding

## Contract Details

* **Contract Reference:** cb-622-45858941
* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-258444/A
* **Publication Date:** 2024-11-12
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-12-16 @ 14:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-12-17
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

## Procurement Category, Description, and Technical Specifications

* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Description:** The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for aircraft oxygen equipment, as specified in the attached documents.
* **Technical Specifications:**
	+ Item 1: GSIN 6680, NSN 01-143-5899, Indicator, Liquid Quantity (Part No. 9A1037, NCAGE: 82686)
	+ Item 2: GSIN 6680, NSN 01-143-5900, Indicator, Liquid Quantity (Part No. 9A1038, NCAGE: 82686)

## Bidder Information

* **Contact Person:** Dany Lebel
* **Contact Email:** [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone Number:** (000) 000-0000
* **Address:** 101 Ch Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

## Tender Instructions

* **Submissions:** Electronic submissions are encouraged using the epost Connect service.
* **Currency:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Business Hours and Delivery Address

* **Business Hours:** Reduced hours due to the COVID-19 pandemic
* **Delivery Address:** 25 CFSD Montreal

Please see the attached documents for further technical specifications and procurement information.

### Attachments

* [Relevant attachment linked in this document]

---

Attachments include a detailed Request for Proposal (RFP) document with all the necessary specifications and details about the contract.
